content.raw: There's a new option, @hsu is adding a way to enable/disable the camera-spacenav connection with `UserCamera::SetJoyTwistControl(bool)`. With that API, we could listen to the buttons in this plugin and turn the UserCamera on/off without getting out of sync. I'll wait for that pull request to stabilize then update accordingly.
